TD Description


Tell us your story. Don't go unnoticed. Explain why you're a winning candidate. Think "TD" if you crave meaningful work and embrace change like we do. We are a trusted North American leader that cares about people and inspires them to grow and move forward.

Stay current and competitive. Carve out a career for yourself. Grow with us. Here's our story: jobs.td.com
 


Department Overview


TD Insurance is part of TD Bank Group, one of Canada’s largest financial institutions. TD Insurance helps protect clients from the ‘accidents of life’ with a wide range of products including credit protection, life, health, travel, home and auto insurance. With more than three million clients, TD Insurance authorized products and services are available online, over the phone, and through a network of more than 1,000 TD Canada Trust branches.

In Canada, we have two lines of business, General Insurance and Life and Health. Our General Insurance business is one of the top home and auto insurance groups in Canada and the national leader in group insurance and affinity marketing. Our Life and Health business is the number one provider of critical illness insurance and direct life and health insurance in Canada.

At TD Insurance, we are committed to fostering an inclusive, accessible environment. With a Canada-wide workforce of over 4,000 employees and offices in Atlantic Canada, Quebec, Ontario and Alberta, our company is always growing and can help you to grow. TD Insurance offers a stable and dynamic work environment where talent is appreciated and professional development is taken seriously. More than just a job, we offer rewarding careers.

The TD Insurance Analytics and Modelling team has the mandate to provide business intelligence using advanced analytical techniques such as machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI) models.  This group is responsible for doing in-depth analysis to better understand claim payments, client or advisor behaviours, product design and a lot more.  This group is also responsible to develop, maintain and calibrate all models used within TD Insurance, including but not limited to loss cost models and customer behaviour models.

Within this team, the Advanced Performance Analytics function is dedicated to provide modeling and analytical support to TD Insurance product offering and to our Customer Advice Center (CAC) to increase its operational excellence.
 


Job Description


Key accountabilities of Data Engineer, CAC Analytics:
- Develop, construct, test and maintain the key architectures of Analytics and Modelling database, 
- Identify methods to improve data reliability, efficiency and quality
- Research and deploy sophisticated analytics programs, machine learning and statistical methods
- Gather and analyze information or data on current and future trends of best practices
- Work autonomously and accountable for acting as a lead within a specialized business management function and may provide work direction to others
- Provide seasoned specialized knowledge, advice and/or guidance to various stakeholders and team members
- Undertake and complete a variety of complex projects and initiatives requiring specialist knowledge and/or the integration of cross functional processes within own area of expertise
- Oversee and/or independently perform tasks from end to end
 


Job Requirements

This position requires a combination of dedication and attention to detail, on one hand, and quick learning, creativity, and non-standard thinking; on the other hand. It also requires ability to work as a team, communication, and presentation skills. 

A successful candidate is expected to have:
4+ years of relevant working experience
Sound knowledge in data modelling, architech and data deployment
A university degree in quantitative discipline (Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Actuarial Science or related field); An advanced degree is an asset
Proficiency in programing such as SQL, Python/R, Scala, Spark etc., in the context of data manipulation, data mining, statistical analysis, and predictive modelling;
Proved to be a quick learner, strong problem-solving skills, ability to independently identify and solve problems in an effective and timely manner;
Strong communication skills (both written and oral), ability to effectively present technical, business, and project management subjects to multiple stakeholders.
Sound knowledge in industry best practices in predictive modelling, including machine learning algorithms (Asset)
Frontend knowledge such as React or Vue (Good to have) 


Inclusiveness


At TD, we are committed to fostering an inclusive, accessible environment, where all employees and customers feel valued, respected and supported. We are dedicated to building a workforce that reflects the diversity of our customers and communities in which we live and serve.  If you require an accommodation for the recruitment/interview process (including alternate formats of materials, or accessible meeting rooms or other accommodation), please let us know and we will work with you to meet your needs.

It turns out… unicorns are real! In fact, FreshBooks just became one after raising our valuation to more than $1 billion. And ever since launching in 2003, we’ve been on a steady incline towards one goal: Building easy-to-use accounting software for small business owners. It’s the goal that’s driven us to expand into five offices, serving customers in over 160 countries. And it’s the goal we’d love for you to be a part of as a member of our global team as we continue our journey.

Known for extraordinary product and customer service experiences and based in Toronto, Canada, FreshBooks serves paying customers in over 120 countries, with offices in the U.S., Netherlands and Croatia.


The Opportunity - Analytics Engineer, Business Operations



Location: 
Canada, Remote


Department: 
Data & Analytics

The Business Operations department is a critical component within the Data Org and works closely with Analytics and Engineering - ensuring the availability of the data and insight needed by the organization to drive the business. Analytics Engineer will be working closely with our Engineering and Analytics teams to ensure that our BI/Analytics platform is designed and optimized - enabling our business through self-serve insights. The right person for this role will have strong problem solving skills and be able to find the right solution even when presented with ambiguous situations. You will be collaborating with other analysts, engineers, project managers, and stakeholders to enhance the experience of analytics at FreshBooks.


Specifically in this position you will:



Building and maintaining overall structure of LookML code base

Build and optimize dashboards and reports for the senior leaders/executive team

Add documentation for new and existing data points

Collaborate with data analysts and engineers to identify potential changes in data definitions

Handle changes to large collections of dashboards using available tools

Assist in data definition change management by staging versions of live dashboards with updated definitions for impact analysis

Writing tests for LookML that translate directly to DBT standards in engineering pipeline

Work with data analysts to maintain embedded reporting in various web applications (Slack, Google Sites, Jupyter Notebooks, etc)

Reviewing code for all Looker Contributors




We think 


you'll


 be an amazing fit for this position if your application can demonstrate:



Advanced knowledge of SQL & using Common Table Expressions

3-5 years in data analytics and/or business intelligence

Experience using a dashboarding tool such as Looker, Periscope, Tableau

Comfortable picking up new tools, bonus for experience with APIs

Exceptional communication skills




Why Join Us


We're an ambitious bunch, with our eyes laser-focused on shipping extraordinary experiences to small business owners. You will be surrounded by hardworking team members who share a common vision for what an amazing software company could be, and have the opportunity to help build an elite one.


Apply Now


Have we got your attention? Submit your application today and a member of our recruitment team will be in touch with you shortly!

FreshBooks is an equal opportunity employer that embraces the differences in all of our employees. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all FreshBookers. All applicants are evaluated based on their experience and qualifications in relation to this position.


FreshBooks provides employment accommodation during the recruitment process. Should you require any accommodation, please indicate this on your application and we will work with you to meet your accessibility needs. For any questions, suggestions or required documents regarding accessibility in a different format, please contact us at phone 416-780-2700 and/or accessibility@freshbooks.com.

Wenco International Mining Systems
 (www.wencomine.com), a subsidiary of Hitachi (Ranking among the top 100 companies in the world according to Fortune Global 500 in 2021), provides industry leading, innovative technologies to customers in the mining and material movement sectors, enabling sustainable and safe operations.
 
Wenco is looking for an 
Atlassian Expert (Developer & Administrator)
 to support cross-departmental projects, support the administration of and lead our R&D team through an evolution of our Atlassian tool chain and its integrations. Do you:


enjoy making a positive impact on people's daily work? 

get excited about optimizing and/or fixing issues at the intersection of people, technologies and business?

have a passion for the artistry in creating and evolving complex systems that directly impact the success of the organization?


If yes then this collaborative, people oriented opportunity is for you.
 

Your Responsibilities



Information Architecture


Facilitate an information management strategy across our Atlassian cloud toolchain (Jira, Jira Service Management, Confluence, Opsgenie, etc) and interfacing systems (SharePoint, Teams, etc)

Document, manage and communicate the information data model/architecture

Define, implement and promote standard methodologies for the use of Confluence


Projects


Support the business process owners by helping them understand the current Atlassian tools/apps, gather requirements, investigate potential solutions, test/demonstrate selected concept and then implement

Create visibility of project status for multiple departmental and cross-departmental projects, drawing from data in multiple systems


Administration & Optimization


Configure, manage, and enhance Atlassian tools, including native functionality as well as researching, testing, and implementing marketplace apps and other integrations.

Develop interfaces between external tooling and Atlassian

Manage and optimize complex Jira / Jira Service Management workflows, automation, screen schemes, permission schemes, and notification schemes.


Product Development Support


Support development and delivery teams by creating holistic views of product development activities

Work with deployment and delivery teams improve processes and speed of delivery

Extending and maintaining


Automation framework as code and CI/CD

Test management app





Your Experience & Knowledge



A degree/diploma in Computer Science, Systems Engineering, Physics, or equivalent.

At least 3 years leading an Atlassian tool chain in a product development environment

Experience with the following:


Implementation and evolving a test management tool in Jira

Utilizing REST APIs of Atlassian tools in order to provide improved automation and reporting capabilities

Supporting release management processes


Proficient with Python, SQL



Nice to Have



At least 3 years of experience as a developer, development manager, release manager, or equivalent in a highly automated software development environment

Confluence cloud blueprint development

Certifications


Jira Administration for Cloud

Managing Jira Projects

Manager Jira Service Projects


Experience with implementation and evolving a test management tool in Jira and a CI/CD pipeline

Experience supporting a hybrid (Agile/Waterfall) development environment



WHY JOIN WENCO?



We provide opportunities for 
career-growth
 within a fast-scaling company

We offer flexible 
remote work
 arrangements

We offer an 
extensive benefits
 plan, including RRSP matching

We offer opportunities for continuous training and
 professional development 
(in-house and external) to learn the latest technologies

We offer our employees a 
profit-sharing
 plan that provides them with the benefits of their hard work

We are heavily involved in the 
community
, joining various events of non-profit organizations and offering our employees 
paid volunteer days


We pride ourselves on our company culture (our last Employee Survey resulted in a score of 100% in 
inclusiveness and diversity
)


Wenco advances the efficiency and safety of the world’s mining operations. We are committed to providing a stable yet exciting workplace environment for individual employees to build and grow their career with the Company.
 
Wenco is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

industries: Software Development and Computer Networking Products
description:
Must Haves:



1+ years of experience working with the data industry (data engineer or data scientist)

Hands-on experience working with python and spark

Possesses a problem-solving mindset with the ability to design data solutions

Experience working within a cloud environment, preferably AWS


 


Pluses:



Experience building big data pipelines

Hands-on experience working on ETL tools


 


Day-to-Day:


Insight Global is looking for 3 Data Engineers to join a large marketing and advertising organization on 6-month contract-to-hire opportunities. As a member of the Data Hub team, you will be responsible for optimizing and expanding their data and data pipeline architecture in addition to optimizing data flows and collection for cross-functional teams. You will be responsible for recommending best options for data transformation and product objectives using your knowledge of trends, best practices and leading-edge techniques. You will expand and develop their cloud analytical platform that enables business users, data analysts and data scientists to make data-driven decisions, build innovative data products and roll out advanced analytics.

ABOUT YOU

You are energetic and driven. You are looking to join a team of people that works together, solves tough problems, challenges each other and trusts each other. You can see and communicate the outcome of technical discussions in the real world. Ultimately, you thrive being part of a small, very talented and motivated group developing the next generation technologies that will change how the world uses WiFi.




WHAT YOU’LL DO

You will work with partner companies along with the platform system integration team to develop Cognitive’s WiFi Motion™ on other platforms. In this highly dynamic position, you'll port software onto multiple platforms, while maintaining high code quality and reliability in the code release. You'll develop application code features as per product specifications and maintain code quality through tests and regressions. You'll own all engineering aspects of the task at hand, from scoping, research and development, testing and delivery. You are passionate about working on bleeding edge technologies and are pragmatic when it comes to system design. Curiosity about how things work will help you solve the challenges we face. While the work will initially focus on embedded systems, we provide growth opportunities for ambitious life-long learners.




WHAT YOU’LL NEED


Solid Python and C application experience with embedded systems

Linux shell scripting skills

Experience in embedded systems development

Experience with system application testing

Curiosity for understanding complex systems

Ability to communicate effectively with stakeholders on Issues and release notes

Problem solving skills on multi-layered systems

Excellent organizational and time management skills

Familiarity with Git version control systems

Understanding of automated build systems

Ability to work from the office as required





BONUS POINTS FOR


Understanding of embedded dynamic linking for Linux systems

Project experience in C (socket communication) and building Linux distro

Understanding of Python internals

Experience with WiFi stack

Knowledge of container framework (e.g., Docker)





Don’t tick all the boxes? We believe that motivation and growth potential are highly valuable characteristics in a job candidate




WHY COGNITIVE SYSTEMS?

We are always on the look-out for bright, highly motivated and energetic A-players to join our team. We encourage an open and agile environment where creative thinking leads to ground-breaking achievements and innovations. We promote a healthy work-life balance in a flexible work setting – on site or remote. We offer competitive salaries, an excellent extended health care benefits plan, 4 weeks of paid vacation annually, a fitness and wellness credit, and we even provide a free catered lunch daily! Most importantly, we are committed to creating the best, most innovative and impactful technology that people will love.

job_title: Indoor Connectivity Solutions Engineer | Ingénieur(e) en solutions de connectivité d'intérieur
description:
Meta Connectivity is constantly iterating to solve problems, co-develop solutions and deploy networks through direct engagement with the global telecoms industry, including network operators, network equipment vendors and communities such as the Telecom Infra Project (TIP). We are looking for a practical, system thinker and technical expert who respectfully questions the status quo to discover and implement high impact solutions. If you have passion for networks and want to work with network operators, industry partners, and internal teams to drive innovative, cost efficient solutions that accelerate the scaled deployment of a faster internet – then this is a great role for you.As an Indoor Wi-Fi Solutions Engineer, you will engage with Meta Connectivity engineering and product teammates as well as TIP OpenWiFi community members to design, develop, trial and deploy Wi-Fi solutions. In parallel, you will interface with industry leading partners including hardware/software vendors and system solution providers. Finally, you will work closely with network operators technical teams to understand how Meta and its partner’s contributions can be of most impact for indoor connectivity.-------Meta Connectivity fait sans cesse des itérations pour résoudre des problèmes, codévelopper des solutions et déployer des réseaux en collaboration directe avec l'industrie mondiale des télécommunications, y compris les opérateurs de réseaux, les vendeurs d'équipement et des communautés telles que Telecom Infra Project (TIP). Nous recherchons une personne à l'esprit pratique et à la pensée systémique, qui questionne le statu quo avec respect afin de découvrir et mettre en pratique des solutions à grande portée. Si vous êtes passionné(e) pour les réseaux et que vous voulez travailler avec des opérateurs de réseaux, des partenaires de l'industrie et des équipes à l'interne pour produire des solutions novatrices, rentables et efficaces qui permettront d'accélerer le déploiement à grande échelle d'un réseau internet plus rapide, alors ceci est un rôle parfait pour vous.En tant qu'ingénieur(e) wifi d'intérieur, vous collaborerez avec vos équipiers à l'ingénierie et aux produits chez Meta Connectivity ainsi qu'avec des membres de la communauté TIP OpenWiFi pour concevoir, développer, mettre à l'essai et déployer des solutions wifi. Parallèlement, vous communiquerez avec des partenaires éminents au sein de l'industrie, dont des vendeurs de produits matériels/logiciels et des fournisseurs de solutions système. Finalement, vous travaillerez de près avec les équipes techniques d'opérateurs de réseaux pour comprendre comment les contributions de Meta et de ses partenaires peuvent produire le plus grand impact pour la connectivité d'intérieur.

Indoor Connectivity Solutions Engineer | Ingénieur(e) en solutions de connectivité d'intérieur Responsibilities:



Develop use cases & requirements, architect, design, develop, and test solutions working closely with network operators, SaaS cloud providers, ODM hardware providers, application vendors (ISVs), system integrators (SIs), as well as internal engineering, product, and cross-functional teams. | Développer des cas d'utilisation et des exigences, faire l'architecture, la conception, le développement et le test de solutions en collaboration étroite avec des opérateurs de réseaux, des fournisseurs infonuagiques SaaS, des fournisseurs de matériel ODM, des éditeurs de logiciels indépendants (ELI), des intégrateurs de systèmes (IS), ainsi qu'avec des équipes d'ingénierie, de produits et multi-disciplinaires à l'interne.

Support the Community Development of Open Indoor Systems that enable network operators to quickly adopt innovative, lowest total cost of ownership approaches for indoor connectivity. | Soutenir le Développement communautaire de systèmes d'intérieur ouverts, qui permet aux opérateurs de réseaux d'adopter rapidement des approches novatrices et à faible coût pour la connectivité d'intérieur.

Work closely with and support network operators and infrastructure providers to plan and execute deployment projects from lab/field/market trials to scale deployments. | Travailler de près et soutenir les opérateurs de réseaux et les fournisseurs d'infrastructure pour la planification et l'exécution de projets de déploiment, depuis les essais en labo/sur le terrain/sur le marché jusqu'au déploiment à grande échelle.

Strong communication, interpersonal, and collaboration experience with both external partners (technical & non-technical) and internal cross-functional teams. | Solide expérience en communication, en relations interpersonnelles et en collaboration, autant avec des partenaires à l'externe (techniques et non techniques) qu'avec des équipes multi-disciplinaires à l'interne.

Willingness to work within partner - vendor facilities, able to travel up to 10% time, and/or cross-time zone calls. | Volonté de travailler sur des sites appartenant à des partenaires/vendeurs, capacité à voyager jusqu'à 10 % du temps et/ou à effectuer des appels hors de son fuseau horaire.



Minimum Qualifications:



Experience working across technical domains and organizations to identify, describe and define end-to-end solutions and approaches | Expérience de travail multidisciplinaire et avec plusieurs organisations pour identifier, décrire et définir des solutions et des approches intégrées.

Experience with network centric software architecture, data model, and API design & implementation | Expérience avec l'architecture logicielle, la modélisation de données et la conception d'API réseaucentriques.

Experience with Linux Foundation (LF) Networking/network operating systems | Expérience avec les systèmes d'exploitation et de réseautage de la Fondation Linux (FL).

Experience in one or more scripting languages such as Python, Bash, etc., and debugging scripting issues | Expérience avec un ou plusieurs langages de script, tels que Python, Bash, etc., ainsi qu'avec le débogage de problèmes de scriptage.

Experience with micro-services architectures for network management and automation systems | De l'expérience dans le domaine des architectures micro-services pour les systèmes de gestion et d'automatisation des réseaux.

Knowledge of core network, Access Network design and Edge Computing/Function Virtualization | Connaissance du réseau central, de la conception du réseau d'accès et de l'informatique de périphérie/de la virtualisation des fonctions.

Experience with operator back office OSS systems including Inventory, Assurance and Service Activation | De l'expérience dans les systèmes OSS de service d'appui des opérateurs, notamment l'inventaire, l'assurance et l'activation des services.

Experience with release engineering, CI/CD tools, DevOps tools (Ansible, Jenkins, Docker, etc.), and automated testing of network software | Expérience avec l'ingénierie de mise en production, les outils CI/CD, les outils DevOps (Ansible, Jenkins, Docker, etc.) et le test de logiciels réseau automatisé.

Firm understanding of mobile and in-building wireless network infrastructure and architectures | Connaissance approfondie de l'infrastructure et des architectures des réseaux sans fil mobiles et internes aux bâtiments.

Familiarity with the evolution and recent development of cellular and Wi-Fi wireless networking | Familiarité avec l'évolution et le développement récent des réseaux sans fil cellulaires et Wi-Fi

Experience with Wi-Fi back office systems including captive portals, network assist, authentication and redirection | Expérience avec les systèmes wifi administratifs, incluant les portails captifs, l'aide au réseautage, l'authentification et la redirection

Experience understanding and describing network management and automation solutions for multiple deployment and operations scenarios including in-building/outdoor uses cases, fixed/mobile access, enterprise/public access | De l'expérience dans la compréhension et la description des solutions de gestion et d'automatisation des réseaux pour de multiples scénarios de déploiement et d'exploitation, y compris les cas d'utilisation à l'intérieur et à l'extérieur des bâtiments, l'accès fixe/mobile, l'accès aux entreprises et au public.

Communication skills including experience talking to both technical and business audiences. Knowledge to collaborate with both external partners and internal cross-functional teams | Habiletés en communication, incluant de l'expérience avec des auditoires provenant des milieux techniques et des affaires. Connaissances permettant de collaborer avec des partenaires externes ainsi qu'avec des équipes multidisciplinaires à l'interne.

Understanding of business-related aspects of a solution, and proven to interact with business teams on technical & economic aspects of a solution | Compréhension des aspects commerciaux d'une solution, et preuve d'expérience en interaction avec des équipes en milieu d'affaires sur les aspects techniques et économiques d'une solution.

Currently has, or is in the process of obtaining a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, relevant technical field, or equivalent practical experience. Degree must be completed prior to joining Meta. | Possède, ou est en train d'obtenir une licence en informatique, en génie informatique, dans un domaine technique pertinent, ou une expérience pratique équivalente. Le diplôme doit être obtenu avant de rejoindre Meta.



Preferred Qualifications:

About the job


We are looking for experienced front-end, back-end and full-stack developers and software engineers to develop high-quality testable and scalable applications. The ideal candidate will be adaptable and able to work with several complex issues at the same time (makes the working day interesting). This position will also involve software performance improvement, testing, deployment, as well as development of APIs and integrations.  





Tasks and responsibilities:



Develop QualiWare based solutions, quality software and web application products related to business management (Enterprise Architecture, process management, application, risk, goals and KPIs, quality and compliance management, and auditing)

Identify business needs and discover potential opportunities for improvement of existing solutions. Analyze and maintain existing software applications

Translate business needs into both functional and technical solution descriptions

Create requirements specification, estimate tasks and be able to present this to customers

Design and develop highly scalable, testable solutions for our customers either independently or with other developers

Evaluate, test, and ensure the quality of the solutions we deliver

Discover and fix programming bugs


 


Qualifications: 



3 years of experience as a developer/software engineer working mostly in C#, JavaScript, HTML and CSS, but you should also have experience with other languages ​​and technologies such as React, Flutter, Angular, JQuery and web services


Must 
be eligible for a Government of Canada security clearance

Experience as a tech lead / solution architect is an advantage, but not a requirement

Knowledge and interest in technical architecture for servers, databases, firewalls, infrastructure, etc. Azure experience nice to have

Knowledge of agile development methods

Higher education at university / college level in IT or other relevant subjects (can be replaced with relevant experience)


 


Personal characteristics: 



Solution-oriented and curious about technology and has a genuine interest in the subject

Willing to learn and open to getting acquainted with new issues

Ability to present and explain issues to both IT and non-technical system users

Structured, proactive, motivated, responsible and a team-player

Strong English oral and written skills. French is nice to have but not required

We are seeking a Full Stack Software Developer to build and scale a variety of Web and Mobile Products for an intriguing range of clients.




This is a unique opportunity to work alongside an experienced team that excels at building SaaS products. This position reports to a Development Team Lead.




Key Responsibilities include:


Design, build, scale, and enhance Software Products, Apps, and Platforms based on Client Needs and Business Requirements

Communicate Technical Topics clearly, in language that can be easily understood by Clients

Collaborate with Designers, and Product Teams to propose solutions to meet the goals of Clients and their Products

Define, refine, and document Best Practices that enable excellent team performance






Qualifications


Experience developing applications in Ruby on Rails, React, React Native, Node, or Java is necessary, though the role also requires a voracious appetite to learn and apply new skills. You should be skilled at building web-based software or mobile apps and excel at learning new languages and frameworks.




We’re looking for someone who:


Has 5+ years of full-stack software development experience

Has experience building and scaling Software Products

Has experience architecting and deploying Software Products to Cloud Providers like Google Cloud, Amazon Web Services, or Azure

Preferably has several years of experience with some combination of NodeJS, Ruby on Rails, React, React Native, and Angular






Benefits



Remote

Unlimited PTO

Subsidized Medical, Dental, and Vision Insurance

Short/Long Term Disability

Profit Sharing

Referral Bonuses

Company Retreats

Bellwood Labs is a dynamic Product Development Consultancy (with our own SaaS Marketing Dashboard product, Converge), founded in Atlanta and funded by Mark Cuban, that has navigated to profitability and is hiring for growth.





Our Mission 


Bellwood Labs seeks to be and be known as the most trusted partner to develop and advance software products





Our Core Values



We Embrace Your Goals

We Own our Commitments

We Succeed through Empathy

We Take the Next Step






Join our tight-knit team of sharp technologists to leverage your talents and grow your skills. We are looking forward to meeting with you!

industries: IT Services and IT Consulting, Banking, and Financial Services
description:
We’re building a relationship-oriented bank for the modern world. We need talented, passionate professionals who are dedicated to doing what’s right for our clients.

At CIBC, we embrace your strengths and your ambitions, so you are empowered at work. Our team members have what they need to make a meaningful impact and are truly valued for who they are and what they contribute.

To learn more about CIBC, please visit CIBC.com



Job Description




 What You'll Be Doing 


You’ll be joining CIBC’s Alternate Solutions Group. You’ll be at the heart of CIBC’s digital transformation, successfully delivering complex, enterprise-scale projects involving multiple back-end systems. As a Front End Web Developer you will build, implement and maintain easy, flexible, and personalized solutions that enhance the client experience.

At CIBC we enable the work environment most optimal for you to thrive in your role. Details on your work arrangement (proportion of on-site and remote work) will be discussed at the time of your interview



How You'll Succeed




 Analysis & Support: Evaluate requests to ensure stability and support of applications. Coordinate and/or execute implementation plans. Identify and resolve small to medium complex production problems. Monitor and analyze supported services and applications to identify opportunities for improvement and recommend solutions

 Leadership Skills: Act as the application tech lead and run code-review sessions with the wider team to ensure the project is on track to meet objectives. Support and mentor intermediate and senior team members by sharing knowledge, collaborating and problem solving.

 Act as a SME : Review requirements and provide feedback on problems and provide critical solutions and services in a timely and cost-effective manner. Provide estimates for assigned work packages and take the lead role in delivery. Ensure that expected application performance levels are achieved and SLAs are met.

 Manage & Influence : Lead coordination efforts in operational activities to provide optimal end-to-end solutions for clients. Identify proactive solutions for recurring technology occurrences to benefit the business.

 Strategy & Technology Design: Design, implement, configure, and manage solutions within the supported products, and services. Research and recommend innovative and automated approaches for operational tasks.

 Design and Development: Perform and coordinate application activities. Design the application's technical infrastructure using specific databases, programming languages, utilities, and testing approaches. Lead the design and development of cost-effective and innovative solutions. 

 Strategic Planning: Lead multiple projects involving upgrade or migration of systems, new technology, and the enhancement of existing applications.




Who You Are




 You can demonstrate experience in : NodeJS, Angular, TypeScript, MongoDB, ELK, Kong, Swagger, REST API. It’s an asset if you have some experience with cloud technologies like AWS or Azure. 

 You embrace and champion change. You'll continuously evolve your thinking and the way you work in order to deliver your best.

 Your influence makes an impact. You know that relationships and networks are essential to success. You inspire outcomes by making yourself heard.

 You’re digitally savvy. You seek out innovative solutions and embrace evolving technologies. You can easily adapt to new tools and trends.

 You're driven by collective success. You know that collaboration can transform a good idea into a great one. You understand the power of an inclusive team that enjoys working together to create a shared vision.

 Values matter to you. You bring your real self to work and you live our values - trust, teamwork, and accountability.




What CIBC Offers



At CIBC, your goals are a priority. We start with your strengths and ambitions as an employee and strive to create opportunities to tap into your potential. We aspire to give you a career, rather than just a paycheck.


We work to recognize you in meaningful, personalized ways including a competitive salary, incentive pay, banking benefits, a health benefits program, defined benefit pension plan, an employee share purchase plan and MomentMakers, our social, points-based recognition program

Our spaces and technological toolkit will make it simple to bring together great minds to build innovative solutions that make a difference for our clients

We cultivate a culture where you can express your ambition through initiatives like Purpose Day; a paid day off dedicated for you to use to invest in your growth and development




What You Need To Know




 CIBC is committed to creating an inclusive environment where all team members and clients feel like they belong. We seek applicants with a wide range of abilities and we provide an accessible candidate experience. If you need accommodation, please contact Mailbox.careers-carrieres@cibc.com 

 You need to be legally eligible to work at the location(s) specified above and, where applicable, must have a valid work or study permit 

 CIBC is committed to doing our part to protect our team, our clients and our communities. We want to ensure we have a safe and healthy workplace, and we want to do our part to get through this pandemic. In keeping with this commitment, and as a condition of employment, CIBC requires all successful candidates to be fully vaccinated against COVID-19 as of their start date, or provide written proof of a medical exemption, or other substantiated accommodation request under applicable human rights legislation. 



Job Location


Toronto-161 Bay St., 4th


Employment Type


Regular


Weekly Hours


37.5

We are seeking a Full Stack Software Developer to build and scale a variety of Web and Mobile Products for an intriguing range of clients. 

 

This is a unique opportunity to work alongside an experienced team that excels at building SaaS products. This position reports to a Development Team Lead.




Key Responsibilities include:


Design, build, scale, and enhance Software Products, Apps, and Platforms based on Client Needs and Business Requirements

Communicate Technical Topics clearly, in language that can be easily understood by Clients

Collaborate with Designers, and Product Teams to propose solutions to meet the goals of Clients and their Products

Define, refine, and document Best Practices that enable excellent team performance


 


Qualifications


Experience developing applications in Ruby on Rails, React, React Native, Node, or Java is necessary, though the role also requires a voracious appetite to learn and apply new skills. You should be skilled at building web-based software or mobile apps and excel at learning new languages and frameworks. 




We’re looking for someone who:


Has 3+ years of full-stack software development experience

Has experience building and scaling Software Products

Has experience architecting and deploying Software Products to Cloud Providers like Google Cloud, Amazon Web Services, or Azure

Preferably has several years of experience with some combination of NodeJS, Ruby on Rails, React, React Native, and Angular

Is fluent in English (written and spoken)


 


Benefits



Remote 

Unlimited PTO

Subsidized Medical, Dental, and Vision Insurance

Short/Long Term Disability

Profit Sharing

Referral Bonuses

Company Retreats






Company Description


Bellwood Labs is a dynamic Product Development Consultancy (with our own SaaS Marketing Dashboard product, Converge), founded in Atlanta and funded by Mark Cuban, that has navigated to profitability and is hiring for growth.





Our Mission 


Bellwood Labs seeks to be and be known as the most trusted partner to develop and advance software products





Our Core Values



We Embrace Your Goals

We Own our Commitments

We Succeed through Empathy

We Take the Next Step






Join our tight-knit team of sharp technologists to leverage your talents and grow your skills. We are looking forward to meeting with you!

You are comfortable leading the build of a large interactive web project, using the latest technologies to produce top-tier digital solutions.




You set high standards for yourself for quality, performance, and maintainability while keeping scope, budget, and timeline in mind.




You are capable of leading a team, helping the entire team to hone their skills, and build a positive team culture – while embracing and supporting unique personalities.





Requirements



Minimum 5 years of development experience in an agency setting

Technical lead on a team consisting of multiple interdisciplinary developers

Work together with a technical producer on architecture, scope, tech stack, timeline etc.

Good understanding of key web vitals

Good knowledge of tools, frameworks and services

Creative problem solving

Manage trade-offs between scope, quality, time and cost

Languages / Frameworks / Technologies

React (NextJS)

SaSS

GraphQL

NodeJS

WebGL

GSAP

Tools

Git & Github actions

AWS (basic dev-ops skills)






Benefits



Competitive salary

Remote culture

Work from anywhere (but must be able to work EST hours)

Medical benefits

Paid holiday and time off!

About the Team:


Enterprise Integration Platform Services team provides Platform as Services by building, maintaining, and operating lululemon enterprise integration platforms - which includes Kafka, Apigee, and OSB. Teams provides tools and capabilities to the organization which allow easy, friction free adoption of integration platforms. 




The Senior Cloud Infrastructure Engineer is a key role facilities Enterprise Integration Platform Services team's cloud journey. The individual in this role will be collaborating with product managers, solution architects, and platform engineers to design and implement solutions that enable platform engineer agility to delivery capability that drive business value. 




The Senior Cloud Infrastructure Engineer will provide technical expertise to application and platform team to facilitate deployment of containerized platform components, reusable templates/libraries using Kubernetes, Rancher, AWS, and Azure. This individual will also design/implement the modularized CI/CD pipelines to achieve continuously development and deployment without major impact to production systems. 





Key Responsibilities:



Create the well-informed Integration Platform cloud strategy and manage the adaption process.

Develop cloud-based large-scale platform with high throughput and reliability.

Produce the architecture design solution with application/platform engineer in mind, making adoption easy.

Continuously drive improves in areas like performance, automation, quality, monitoring, and reliability of platforms.

Working closely with IT security team to implement and monitor the cloud security policies.

Offer technical guidance to other cloud/devops engineers.

Estimate/optimize cloud cost.

Response to technical issue in a professional and timely manner. 

Identify and anticipate top cloud architecture solutions and features to successfully meet the strategic needs of the company. 






Job Requirements:



Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Technology or relevant field

Professional level Cloud certification 






Required Skills & Experience
:


5+ years designing, executing, and supporting cloud-based solutions 

2+ years Kubernetes, GitHub, Jenkins, Terraform experience 

2+ years building and managing cloud monitoring infrastructure, such as Grafana, Prometheus, and Splunk

2+ years Vault Enterprise experience

Comprehensive experience with at least one major cloud service provider (AWS, Microsoft Azure, GCP, Alibaba Cloud) 

Lean Agile mentality 

Acknowledges the presence of choice in every moment and takes personal responsibility for their actions 

Ability to create clearly defined technical documentation (ex: Technical requirements, design documentation, Architectural review materials, technology guidelines and best practices)

industries: IT Services and IT Consulting, Software Development, and Financial Services
description:
About BeyondTrust



BeyondTrust is the worldwide leader in Privileged Access Management (PAM), empowering organizations to secure and manage their entire universe of privileges. Our integrated products and platform offer the industry's most advanced PAM solution, enabling organizations to quickly shrink their attack surface across traditional, cloud, and hybrid environments.

Learn more at www.beyondtrust.com.



Who You Are




Smart, kind, flexible, determined 

Passionate about data performance, quality and integrity 

Enthusiastic about what you do and have a high interest in keeping up with current best practices in your areas of expertise 

Someone who enjoys discussing the tradeoffs between different data structure choices, both on theoretical and applied levels 

Write code that is understandable, simple, and clean 

Someone who would rather automate something once, then to do it twice 




What You'll Do




Continuously explore new and creative ways to take on complex data-related problems 

Design, develop and deploy data pipelines and backend services 

Create new data architectures for massive scale and high performance 

Collaborate with other team members to transform and improve existing data solutions 

Help find hidden insights in large datasets 




What You Know




Data warehousing, data modeling, and data transformation. 

Proficient in SQL, MapReduce, and ETL technologies. 

Experience with sourcing and modeling data from application APIs 

When best to use different database technologies (RDBMS, NoSQL, Time-Series, etc.) 

Experience with SQL clusters / sharding 




Bonus Points




Experience with Azure SQL Elastic Pools

Familiarity with Azure Log Analytics, Dashboards, or Workbooks

Familiarity with Entity Framework 

Experience w/ MSSQL Stored Procedures 

Experience with DBaaS offerings (AWS RDS, Azure Databases, etc.) 



A Note on Covid-19


It’s paramount that you feel safe and secure throughout our hiring process and, if successful, as you onboard into the business. In response to the current Covid-19 pandemic, whilst the majority of our offices remain open, we are recommending that our employees work from home where possible. All of our interviews are taking place virtually over Microsoft Teams or Zoom and we are onboarding all-new global hires on a remote basis.

We understand that the world of work is evolving and we are a company that prides itself on our adaptability and ability to provide an inclusive and flexible environment that embraces all team members regardless of whether they are based in one of our offices or at home.


BeyondTrust is an EEO/AA/Disability/Vets Employer and an equal opportunity employer, offering a competitive salary with excellent benefits. We welcome all candidate applications who meet the minimum qualifications listed above.


What truly makes BeyondTrust special are the people – people who keep the culture strong and make working here exciting, rewarding, and ultimately fun!

Search @beyondtrust and #beyondtrustlife on Twitter and LinkedIn to find out more.

job_title: System-2 Deep Learning and Neural Reasoning Researcher
industries: Software Development, Wireless Services, and Semiconductor Manufacturing
description:
Company



Qualcomm Canada ULC



Job Area



Engineering Group, Engineering Group > Machine Learning Researcher



Job Overview




General Summary


Qualcomm AI Research is looking for world-class researchers in deep learning, to join a high-caliber team of engineers inventing machine learning technology to provide best-in-class solutions while running with the most efficient use of power, memory, and computation.

Members of our team are part of a multi-disciplinary core research group within Qualcomm which spans software, hardware, and systems, and our members may simultaneously contribute to technology deployed worldwide by partnering with our industry-leading businesses across mobile, compute, automotive, cloud, and IOT. Our research team has demonstrated first-in-the-world research and proof-of-concepts in areas such model efficiency, neural video codecs, video semantic segmentation, federated learning, and wireless RF sensing (https://www.qualcomm.com/ai-research), has won major research competitions such as the visual wake word challenge, and converted leading research into best-in-class user-friendly tools such as Qualcomm Innovation Center’s AI Model Efficiency Toolkit (https://github.com/quic/aimet).

The R&D work responsibility for this position focuses on the following


 Fundamental machine learning research on neural reasoning and connectionist approaches to “System-2” cognition in a neural network.

 Study of approaches to integrating multimodal perception and language to push a neural network’s abilities towards reason and decision making.

 Research the role of language in instructing the neural network at run-time (“prompting”) and in guiding the network towards better solutions during training (“explanations”).

 Identify new applications that benefit from the increased ability to perform end-to-end sequential reasoning and decision making.





Ideal Candidates Will Demonstrate The Following




 Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Information Systems, or related field.

 Extensive experience in training neural networks (including CNNs, RNNs, Attention/Transformers).

 Extensive experience in modeling, implementing, and training neural networks in high-level languages and frameworks like PyTorch or TensorFlow





Other Desirable Skills




 PhD in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field

 Track record of research excellence and high-quality publications (e.g. ICLR, NeurIPS, CVPR, ICML, ICCV, etc.)

 Experience with recurrent neural networks and/or autoregressive language models, such as GPT and similar models

 Experience helpful in Reinforcement Learning and modern approaches to offline RL, such as Decision Transformers/Trajectory Transformers



Physical Requirements


Frequently transports between offices, buildings and campuses up to ½ mile.

Frequently transports and install equipment up to 5 lbs.

Performs required tasks at various heights (e.g. standing or sitting).

Monitors and utilizes computers and test equipment for more than 6 hours a day.

Continuous communication which includes the comprehension of information with colleagues, customers and vendors both in person and remotely.





Education




Minimum Qualifications


Masters - Computer Engineering, Masters - Computer Science, Masters - Electrical Engineering



Work Experiences



2+ years Software Engineering, Hardware Engineering, Systems Engineering, or related work experience.

6 months of experience developing and/or optimizing machine learning models, systems, platforms, or methods



Skills




Certifications:




Education




Preferred Qualifications


Doctorate - Computer Engineering, Doctorate - Computer Science, Doctorate - Electrical Engineering



Work Experiences



2+ years experience working in a large matrixed organization. ,1+ years of work experience in a role requiring interaction with senior leadership (e.g., Director level and above). ,2+ publications at a machine learning conference ,1+ years experience with machine learning research related to new models, systems innovations, platforms, or methodology



Skills



AI Frameworks, Creating the New and Different, Deep Learning, Developing Prototypes, Machine Learning, Mathematical Modeling, Python


Applicants
: If you need an accommodation, during the application/hiring process, you may request an accommodation by sending email to 
accommodationsupport

: Our Careers Site is only for individuals seeking a job at Qualcomm. Staffing and recruiting agencies and individuals being represented by an agency are not authorized to use this site or to submit profiles, applications or resumes, and any such submissions will be considered unsolicited. Qualcomm does not accept unsolicited resumes or applications from agencies. Please do not forward resumes to our jobs alias, Qualcomm employees or any other company location. Qualcomm is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes/applications.

If you would like more information about this role, please contact Qualcomm Careers.

job_title: Développeur DevOps à l’aide de Kubernetes
industries: IT Services and IT Consulting, Software Development, and Financial Services
description:
Nous Offrons




L’occasion de travailler avec certains des meilleurs professionnels du secteur, au sein d’une société qui valorise l’intellect individuel tout comme le travail d’équipe

Des bureaux à la fine pointe de la technologie aménagés pour maximiser la collaboration

Des conditions de travail flexibles. 

Des défis enrichissants offrant la possibilité d’apprendre et de progresser constamment

Un environnement qui exploite tout le potentiel de la technologie




Profil De L’équipe



La division services technologiques de l’entreprise offre des services techniques partagés à l’ensemble de l’entreprise en vue de soutenir toutes les applications commerciales et les utilisateurs finaux. Elle est présente à toutes les étapes du cycle de développement des logiciels de l’entreprise afin d’assurer une programmation, des tests fonctionnels et d’intégration et des lancements d’application efficaces, en plus d’assurer un soutien et un suivi continu pour plus de 3 000 applications de production.

Elle s’occupe également de livrer toutes les technologies du milieu de travail (de bureau, mobiles, audio, vidéo, de productivité, intranet ou internet) dans une configuration intégrée permettant de maximiser la productivité des employés. Elle livre ses applications et offre ses services aux utilisateurs finaux par l’entremise d’une infrastructure évolutive, sécuritaire et fiable composée de services informatiques et infonuagiques, de centres et de bases de données, et de réseaux et de stockage parfaitement intégrés.



Description Du Poste



Morgan Stanley est à la recherche d’un candidat expérimenté pour se joindre à son groupe d’ingénierie de calculs et de stockage. Cette personne sera responsable de simplifier la complexité du déploiement et de l’installation intégrés des applications en développant et en recommandant des modèles de déploiement certifiés OCI pour une orchestration cohérente de microservices, notamment la capacité à tolérer avec grâce les pannes et les reprises des applications.

Au sein de l’équipe des activités informatiques et technologiques de Morgan Stanley, le groupe d’ingénierie de calculs et de stockage est l’un des principaux groupes d’ingénierie des infrastructures. Il est responsable de divers aspects essentiels de la technologie et de l’ingénierie tels que l’ingénierie Agile, la distribution de logiciels, l’ingénierie des plateformes (IaaS et PaaS), l’ingénierie de conteneurs Linux et DDI et l’intégration des clients.

La personne retenue aura une forte visibilité aux échelons les plus élevés et travaillera en étroite collaboration avec la direction de la société et l’ensemble de la communauté externe.



Expérience Pratique Essentielle




Expérience pertinente avec Docker et les normes OCI (Open Container Initiative) ainsi que forte préférence pour l’ingénierie Kubernetes/OCI

Expérience pertinente en utilisation des techniques d’écosystème Docker/Kubernetes (déploiements OCI comprenant l’authentification transparente, la découverte de services, le mouvement des données, l’équilibrage des charges, la gestion et l’hébergement du trafic, les calculs sans serveurs et les services maillés)

Connaissances approfondies et vaste expérience dans le domaine du déploiement d’applications à l’aide de Kubernetes et forte préférence pour OpenShift pour les nuages tant publics que privés

Expérience en création d’applications natives infonuagiques

Connaissance des pratiques DevOps et Agile

Excellentes aptitudes de communication




Compétences, Qualifications Et Expérience Pertinente




Bonne connaissance de l’intégration et de la livraison continues modernes (CI/CD) et des concepts « source to image »

Bonne connaissance de l’architecture de microservices et des normes du secteur concernant les nuages privés et publics

Bonne connaissance des principes des « 12 facteurs » et de leur mise en œuvre dans la conception des applications

Bonne compréhension des techniques de configuration d’applications comme les pratiques de configuration actuelles, Spring Boot/Cloud, etc.

Expérience pratique en utilisation des modèles de déploiement d’applications infonuagiques comme Blue-Green et Canary ou dans un contexte plus vaste de services maillés, avec Helm, K8 Operators, etc.

Expérience pratique en utilisation de modèles de mise à l’échelle des applications infonuagiques

Bonne compréhension du partage d’état entre les composants infonuagiques extensibles (Kafka, mise en cache dynamique distribuée, Redis, Mongo)

Bonne connaissance des différents moteurs de base de données (p. ex., DB2) et de la gestion et du stockage des états à l’aide de Kubernetes

Bonne connaissance des modèles de conception Kubernetes, y compris des piles d’observabilité et de télémétrie

Compréhension des techniques de SRE, y compris stabilité et modèles d’ingénierie du chaos




À Propos De Nous



Morgan Stanley, chef de file mondial en services financiers, offre un large éventail de services bancaires d’investissement, d’opérations sur titres, de gestion de placements et de gestion de patrimoine. Chez Morgan Stanley Montréal, nous façonnons l’avenir de notre société mondiale et contribuons à notre communauté locale. Notre équipe œuvre dans de nombreux domaines.

Morgan Stanley est un employeur offrant l’égalité professionnelle. Nous travaillons pour offrir un environnement de travail accueillant et favorable dans lequel toutes les personnes peuvent réaliser leur plein potentiel. Notre main-d’œuvre est composée de personnes talentueuses et créatives qui représentent les collectivités dans lesquelles nous exerçons nos activités à travers le monde et qui présentent des compétences, des perspectives, des expériences et un bagage diversifié. Notre profond engagement à bâtir une culture d’inclusion se manifeste par les efforts constants que nous déployons à embaucher du personnel et à assurer son perfectionnement et son avancement en fonction de son talent et de ses compétences.

Dans ce document, l’emploi du masculin n’a d’autres fins que celle d’alléger le texte. Toutes personnes intéressées par ce poste sont invitées à soumettre leur candidature.


Tous nos postes sont situés à Montréal, Québec.


La connaissance du français et de l’anglais est requise.

Le centre de technologie de Montréal en vedette : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QBZ3q5epTIM


Vidéo datant d’octobre 2019


Bâtissez une carrière qui se démarque. Pour plus d’information, visitez le morganstanley.com.


Offre d'emploi publiée le


8 mars 2022


Emplacement principal


Americas-Canada-Quebec-Montreal


Niveau d’éducation


Diplôme d’associé


Emploi


Développement


Type d%27emploi


Temps plein


Échelon


Adjoint conseil

About Us


August is about people. Our partners, our clients and our team make up the lifeblood of our company. We value personal accountability, encourage open, critical thinking and embrace diversity. Most importantly we're interested in how technology can solve the challenges they face.




We help clients across industries adapt and excel in the digital era by offering innovative solutions to challenges across web, mobile, and emerging platforms. Our clients and projects range in scope, industry and size but our commitment to deliver digital solutions to address our customers' needs are a constant.




Full-stack development requires a broad skillset. The best candidates will demonstrate substantial experience within each of the several areas outlined below. Where a 
web developer
 tends to be specialized in either front-end or back-end development, a 

full-stack engineer 

will be proficient across the board, including any associated areas such as database design/management and DevOps.





Full-Stack Developer


The key to exceptional front-end engineering is a thorough understanding of user experience, and in turn, user interface implementation. The latter requires a comprehensive understanding of various front-end technologies, the core being HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It is also beneficial for the engineer to be familiar with various frameworks and libraries, but the specific ones are down to personal preference. It’s a bonus to have an appreciation/understanding of product strategy.




Back-end engineering does not require an understanding of user experience, 
per se
. However, it does demand extensive knowledge of API principles. This does not necessarily have to be REST, but in most cases, this is the preferred paradigm. In addition to this, the candidate must excel in at least one back-end technology as well as database design and implementation. It is also important that the candidate holds more than just a basic understanding of managing relevant infrastructure.





The Role


We are looking for a seasoned full-stack engineer to join our growing team. As an integral part of the technical team, S/He will collaborate with a small team of developers and designers, along with the support and direction of the Technical Lead and Project Manager to build great products for our clients. Successful candidates will have a minimum of five years’ recent experience with all of the skills listed below.





Responsibilities:



Analyze user needs and develop software solutions

Work with the project manager or product owner to meet specification needs

Design and implementation of the overall web architecture

“Pixel-perfect” implementation of our approved user interface

Recommend software upgrades to optimize operational efficiency

Collaborate with other developers to design and optimize code

Create flowcharts and user guides for new and existing programs

Document all programming tasks and procedures

Perform routine software maintenance

Design overall architecture of web applications.

Handle responsive design, accessibility and mobile requirements, leveraging best practices and modern frameworks.

Develop test strategies, design automation frameworks, write unit/integration tests to drive up code coverage, automation metrics, security and data protection

Interact with business partners, teammates, internal users and external users regarding cost estimations, timelines, technical issues, and infrastructure support both pre- and post-production

Utilize disciplined coding practices and concepts to enable agility and delivery of high-quality code that is maintainable and reusable

Update progress daily through Project Management tracking tool (ex. Jira) or Kanban/Agile board.

Design and develop APIs and SDKs for our services or products






Qualifications:



Experience (5+ years) in software development, computer engineering, or other related fields

Experienced (3+ years) with NodeJS, Vue or other back-end programming languages (PHP, Python, Ruby, Java, etc)

Experience (at least 3 years) with ReactJS and other front-end frameworks (advanced JavaScript libraries and frameworks such as AngularJS, KnockoutJS, BackboneJS, DurandalJS etc.)

Experience (5+ years) building on WordPress (NICE TO HAVE)

Database design and management, including being up on the latest practices and associated versions and familiarity with relational databases such as MySQL, Oracle, and SQL Server

Knowledge of GIit code versioning

Engagement and exposure to the full software development life cycle

Deadline and detail-oriented

familiarity with CSS preprocessors, bundlers, and associated languages/syntaxes/libraries ( e.g., Sass, Less, and webpack)

Thorough understanding of user experience and possibly even product strategy

Experience implementing testing platforms and unit tests






Perks



A competitive base salary package

Paid time off: vacation, public holidays, office is closed between Christmas and New Years

Full health and dental benefits

Remote Work Policy

Company parties in the summer, winter, and a few fun events in between

Engaging, fun, and casual company culture





PLEASE INCLUDE A GITHUB REPO AND PORTFOLIO LINK WITH RESUME

Python/ Sql /Cloud skills. 	



Location: Montreal, QC



90k to 120k base + Bonus + Benefits







﻿
**** Staffmax is Offering $2000/- REFFERAL BONUS. Know anyone who might be interested-PLEASE REFER*****






Nice to have



PL/SQL

Any scripting language

Datawarehouse knowledge	






Job Description



• Data Engineer

• SQL (Sybase will be plus but SQL is mandatory)

• Unix/Linux Scripting (Python will be plus)

• Strong communication

• Attitude to learn new technology

job_title: Développeur Java pour les technologies liées aux marchandises
industries: IT Services and IT Consulting, Software Development, and Financial Services
description:
Nous Offrons




L’occasion de travailler avec certains des meilleurs professionnels du secteur, au sein d’une société qui valorise l’intellect individuel tout comme le travail d’équipe

Des bureaux à la fine pointe de la technologie aménagés pour maximiser la collaboration

Des conditions de travail flexibles.

Des défis enrichissants offrant la possibilité d’apprendre et de progresser constamment

Un environnement qui exploite tout le potentiel de la technologie




Profil De L’équipe



Le groupe Technologies des titres institutionnels définit et supervise la stratégie globale pour la technologie et les solutions technologiques sur mesure pour soutenir les activités du groupe Titres institutionnels, ainsi que les activités touchant toute l'entreprise. Nos clients comprennent les marchés à revenus fixes, les marchés des actions, les marchés des produits de base, les banques d'investissement ainsi que les marchés mondiaux de la recherche et des capitaux.



Notre Incidence



Le service des marchandises de Morgan Stanley offre à ses clients des solutions de gestion des risques dans les marchés mondiaux pour les secteurs du pétrole, du gaz, de l’énergie, des métaux, de l’agriculture et plus encore. Les marchandises fournissent les matériaux pour bâtir le monde et les combustibles nécessaires pour l’alimenter en énergie.

Notre entreprise est en constante évolution : les besoins énergétiques du monde se transforment, de nouvelles sources d’énergie sont développées, des marchés liés aux changements climatiques et aux émissions de carbone sont créés. Dans ce contexte, avec l’émergence de produits de négociation, de données des marchés, de préoccupations réglementaires et d’outils de gestion des risques nouveaux et avec leur évolution, le besoin de solutions technologiques se fait sentir.

En vous joignant à l’équipe des technologies liées aux marchandises, vous aurez l’occasion de concevoir et de créer de façon intégrée les systèmes qui soutiennent cette activité fascinante.

Notre équipe est impliquée dans tous les aspects de la technologie de négociation, du cycle de négociation à la gestion des risques en passant par les données sur le marché, les règlements financiers et la livraison physique du sous-jacent. Nous travaillons dans un environnement entièrement agile et interagissons étroitement avec nos utilisateurs à l’échelle de l’organisation. Par conséquent, les membres de l’équipe acquièrent habituellement une bonne compréhension de l’entreprise.



Description Du Poste



Nous cherchons à agrandir notre équipe à Montréal avec des technologues énergiques et motivés qui veulent faire avancer les choses dans un environnement d’affaires dynamique. Vous ferez l’expérience du cycle de développement logiciel complet et y contribuerez en travaillant dans des équipes agiles. Vous pourrez démontrer vos compétences en analyse pour comprendre les problèmes, concevoir et programmer des solutions pour y remédier ainsi que contribuer à faire progresser notre processus DevOps avec des tests, des déploiements et une surveillance automatisés. De plus, il s’agit d’un rôle de direction. Vous bénéficierez d’une formation et de soutien pour devenir un leader dans l’équipe ainsi que pour gérer les livraisons aux clients.

Tous les postes de l’équipe des technologies liées aux marchandises offrent l’occasion de travailler directement avec divers intervenants haut placés de la division Technologie et de leurs partenaires commerciaux. Comme vous ferez partie d’une équipe mondiale, vous collaborerez également avec des membres de l’équipe de toutes les régions. Vous collaborerez avec d’autres équipes d’ingénierie pour comprendre la technologie offerte et la façon dont elle peut être appliquée et mise à profit dans le cadre de nos solutions.

Vous ferez partie d’une vaste plaque tournante technologique située dans les bureaux de Montréal, qui sont à la fine pointe de la technologie et conçus pour le travail d’équipe. Nous appuyons la flexibilité au travail et notre passion est d’offrir des perspectives de carrière enrichissantes.


Pour réussir dans ce poste, voici ce que vous devez posséder :



Vous auriez l’opportunité de gérer une équipe avec une plateforme en pleine croissance, Expérience en développement avec Core Java

Bonne compréhension éprouvée des principes de la conception orientée objet, des modèles de conception et de l’architecture de niveau n

Compréhension du cycle de vie de développement logiciel

Habiletés avec les bases de données relationnelles (SQL, Sybase, Db2, Oracle, etc.)

Expérience avec ces technologies, un atout : Python, Perl, Shell, C#, AngularJS, Scala

Maîtrise du développement sur Linux

Bonnes aptitudes pour la résolution de problèmes et compétences en communication qui facilitent le travail en équipe

La connaissance des services financiers ou des marchandises ou de l’expérience en la matière n’est pas nécessaire, vous serez en mesure d’apprendre au fur et à mesure. Ce qui est important, c’est d’avoir l’énergie et la motivation pour apprendre et se perfectionner.




À Propos De Nous



Morgan Stanley, chef de file mondial en services financiers, offre un large éventail de services bancaires d’investissement, d’opérations sur titres, de gestion de placements et de gestion de patrimoine. Chez Morgan Stanley Montréal, nous façonnons l’avenir de notre société mondiale et contribuons à notre communauté locale. Notre équipe œuvre dans de nombreux domaines.

Morgan Stanley est un employeur offrant l’égalité professionnelle. Nous travaillons pour offrir un environnement de travail accueillant et favorable dans lequel toutes les personnes peuvent réaliser leur plein potentiel. Notre main-d’œuvre est composée de personnes talentueuses et créatives qui représentent les collectivités dans lesquelles nous exerçons nos activités à travers le monde et qui présentent des compétences, des perspectives, des expériences et un bagage diversifié. Notre profond engagement à bâtir une culture d’inclusion se manifeste par les efforts constants que nous déployons à embaucher du personnel et à assurer son perfectionnement et son avancement en fonction de son talent et de ses compétences.

Dans ce document, l’emploi du masculin n’a d’autres fins que celle d’alléger le texte. Toutes personnes intéressées par ce poste sont invitées à soumettre leur candidature.


Tous nos postes sont situés à Montréal, Québec.


La connaissance du français et de l’anglais est requise.

Le centre de technologie de Montréal en vedette : https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QBZ3q5epTIM


Vidéo datant d’octobre 2019


Bâtissez une carrière qui se démarque. Pour plus d’information, visitez le morganstanley.com.


Offre d'emploi publiée le


7 mars 2022


Emplacement principal


Americas-Canada-Quebec-Montreal


Niveau d’éducation


Baccalauréat


Emploi


Développement


Type d%27emploi


Temps plein


Échelon


Adjoint conseil

Nous sommes à la recherche d’un développeur full-stack passionné et créatif pour venir rejoindre notre équipe. La personne aura un rôle clé dans nos équipes de développement tant au niveau Back-End que Front-End afin de mener notre application à un niveau supérieur!




Notre application est composée d’un mélange de sites web, d’API REST et de modules (add-ins) qui s’intègrent directement dans les logiciels de modélisation destinés au BIM. 




Si tu aimes participer activement, proposer des solutions et rester à l’affût des dernières technologies. C’est LE poste pour toi! 





À propos de nous


En quelques mots, chez BIM One nous sommes une équipe de passionnés qui commercialisent BIM Track, une plateforme de collaboration vitale pour le secteur de la construction, et qui permet à nos clients de travailler plus efficacement. Nous nous définissons comme des alliés pour nos clients, car notre produit est là pour les aider à mieux travailler tout en éliminant les maux de tête dans le processus.




Nous avons lancé le produit en 2016, et nous connaissons une croissance soutenue depuis ce temps. Le logo BIM Track a trouvé sa place sur tous les continents et est utilisé par des entreprises de conception, des entrepreneurs généraux et des gestionnaires de construction dans le monde entier. Nous recrutons des personnes intelligentes et compétentes, mais aussi très terre à terre.

Nous sommes fiers de ce que nous mettons sur le marché et aussi de la manière dont nous le faisons ! Nous ne nous contentons pas de fabriquer d'excellents produits, nous les fabriquons avec passion pour des personnes exceptionnelles, et nous le faisons avec humilité, en laissant notre ego à la porte.




Si nous avons éveillé ton intérêt, jette un coup d'œil à la description du poste ci-dessous. Si tu penses que nous pouvons faire de grandes choses ensemble, n'hésite pas un instant et envoie-nous ta candidature dès aujourd'hui!





Tes responsabilités seront:



Développer de nouvelles fonctionnalités pour répondre aux besoins de nos clients et du marché

Proposer des solutions pour régler les problèmes rencontrés

Partager ses connaissances avec le reste de l'équipe

Respecter les derniers standards de qualité en matière de développement logiciel

Participer à l'amélioration de nos processus internes

Participer aux différentes rencontres de planifications

Participer à la revue de code de tes pairs

Assurer la qualité du code livré grâce à des tests unitaires






Tu auras besoin de:



Baccalauréat en informatique ou génie logiciel ou DEC en informatique

Posséder une expérience de 3 années en conception de logiciel

Les connaissances techniques suivantes seront considérées comme un atout très important : Typescript, Node.js, AWS infrastructure

Connaissance des technos web (REACT, Typescript);

Capacité de bien organiser son travail dans une équipe multidisciplinaire.






Pourquoi rejoindre notre équipe:



Formation continue

Horaires flexibles

Environnement de travail style start-up

Mode de travail hybride - maison & bureau (Lévis ou Montréal)

Entreprise “techno”

Assurance collective

Compte soins de santé

Ligne confidentielle de soutien aux employés

Accès à la télémédecine

Jours de congés maladie

Participation de l'employeur au régime de retraite

TRAVAILLER AVEC DES COLLÈGUES INCROYABLES !






Tu te demandes ce qu’est BIM Track?


Excellente question! Voici une petite histoire pour t’aider à mieux comprendre. Une personne est chargée de mener à bien un projet de construction énorme et complexe. Les plans du bâtiment se trouvent dans une maquette 3D (BIM) qui recouvre toutes les différentes parties du projet, comme les systèmes électriques, mécaniques, de plomberie, la maçonnerie, etc., etc. Le problème est que tous les participants à un projet de construction BIM ne sont pas des experts en BIM. Les logiciels de modélisation sont complexes. Sans un produit comme BIM Track, nos clients potentiels sont constamment en train d'extraire des piles de courriels, de feuilles de calcul et de notes de réunion, en se posant des questions telles que : Qui va résoudre le problème de conception? Quelle est l'importance de ce problème ? De quoi avons-nous convenu ? C'est là que notre produit vient sauver la situation... En résumé, BIM Track permet une meilleure coordination et une meilleure coordination permet de meilleurs bâtiments. 




Nous sommes impatients d'avoir de tes nouvelles et d'apprendre à te connaître !
